description: Upgrade plan to migrate project to latest LTS versions

tasks.description: Upgrade to Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4
tasks.requirements: Upgrade JDK to 21, Spring Boot to 3.4, Spring Framework to 6.x, and migrate javax.* to jakarta.* namespace if needed. Update all Spring Boot dependencies to 3.4 compatible versions.
tasks.summary: Successfully upgraded Java from 8 to 21 and Spring Boot from 2.7.18 to 3.4.2. Spring Framework automatically upgraded to 6.x. Migrated javax.* to jakarta.* namespace. All dependencies updated to Spring Boot 3.4 compatible versions.
